summary: This bill, the "Restoring Rights of Physicians to Own Hospitals Act," aims to repeal a provision of the Affordable Care Act (Obamacare) that restricts physician ownership of hospitals. It amends Section 1877 of the Social Security Act to eliminate certain requirements and prohibitions related to hospital ownership and investment, effectively allowing physicians more freedom in hospital ownership. The bill was introduced in the House of Representatives and referred to committees handling healthcare and financial matters.
